Package com.daniel.moune.java.tutorial6

Class Menu

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.daniel.moune.java.tutorial6.Menu
  • public class Menu
extends java.lang.Object

    the menu class to build should look like this

    Student Menu

    -------------------------------

    1. Create a new student
    2. delete an existing student
    3. view the list of students
    4. quit

    -------------------------------

    Please select the option that you want

    Since:
    1.0

      this is the prompt that is displayed in order to explain to the user what he/she is supposed to do

      this is the Menu title that appears on top of the menu
